divs: Sighting Details Near Columbia station in Lorain County, Ohio 8 or more people noticed a bright intense orange yellow light stationary at 15 deg elevation at exactly 10pm EDT, I asked several people what time their watches showed. It occurred on a Saturday in August, maybe the 17th. At an outdoor party while sitting around a very large bonfire out of the due east an orange intense light was noticed. I had consumed no intoxicants, alcohol or other, as my body reacts to alcohol causing joint pain. One lady said - look at that light, it is hovering there. We all watched same for about 1 - 2 minutes at which time it seemed to wink out in a short time. We all conversed about it's shape wondering what it was. It seemed that some observers thought something like a short line was was hanging from the bottom of the object. The expressed emotions were of wonder and puzzlement.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Columbia Station
There were no other sightings in Columbia Station on or around August 17th 2013
Summary: very intense orange light in shape of point down cone. hovered, one jerky move then disappeared
